channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- TELLUS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJI ELECTRIC CO., LTD. and Hakko Electronics Co., Ltd. -- TELLUS

item.title: CVE-2023-47581|2024-08-02T21:09:37.491Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- tellus
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in TELLUS V4.0.17.0 and earlier and TELLUS Lite V4.0.17.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted file (X1, V8, or V9 file), information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.

item.title: CVE-2023-47582|2024-08-02T21:09:37.487Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- tellus
item.description: Access of uninitialized pointer vulnerability exists in TELLUS V4.0.17.0 and earlier and TELLUS Lite V4.0.17.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted file (X1, V8, or V9 file), information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.

item.title: CVE-2023-47580|2024-08-02T21:09:37.401Z -- fuji%20electric%20co.%2C%20ltd.%20and%20hakko%20electronics%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- tellus
item.description: Multiple improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer issues exist in TELLUS V4.0.17.0 and earlier and TELLUS Lite V4.0.17.0 and earlier. If a user opens a specially crafted file (X1, V8, or V9 file), information may be disclosed and/or arbitrary code may be executed.
